name: vega-canvas
description: Canvas and Image object instantiation utilities.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-canvas.js -c -m -o build/vega-canvas.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-canvas.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-canvas.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-canvas.js build/vega-canvas.min.js
